system.descriptionText:
Gain a single Trained Forbidden Lore Skill related to your experiences in a Dark and Traumatic Voyage (or increase that skill by one level), or gain Resistance (Fear).
Gain 1d5 Insanity from whatever traumatic even haunts you.
